answers.answer: *breathing and I can't keep anything down I even got sick on water earlier do u think I should call my ob?
I've felt like that to. Just no energy hot sweaty cold very dizzy. I'm 25 weeks. Are we getting sick or something
It sounds like your blood pressure is up....get into a cool room and lay on your left side....see if that helps....or sit with your feet elevated above your head
I have been laying most of the day it feels like I'm getting worse I have constant stumic pains

Call your obgyn. Sounds a lot like what I had happen the other day but mine was accompanied by a headache. My doc sent ms to the hospital for an evaluation & they tested for pregnancy hypertension and preeclempsia as well as kept checking my blood pressure all while they monitered the little ones heart beat. Id call ur ob sooner rather than later just to be on the safe side esspecially if u cant keep water down
I have this exact problem, I'm 38 weeks. I thought it might have been the heat..
:/...I would say call your doctor since on nothing is helping
My first child I had preeclampsia
Thanks for the sugestions I go see my ob Monday should I talk to her then or call her tomorrow

If you continue to have problems keeping water down call tomorrow first thing so u dont risk dehydration... Otherwise its up to you. I called my doc because my aunt whos a mother baby nurse suggested I should and im a ftm so I freak out at everything

question: I'm 29 weeks pregnant and for 2,days now I have felt awful I'm physically hot and sweaty but i feel like I'm cold any time I stand up I feel dizzy like I'm gonna faint I have had a hard time brea
title: whats wrong with me?
